articles.title: Fever Put Resiliency, Urgency Into Gutsy Game 2 Win - Indiana Fever
articles.description: By Madie Chandler | FeverBasketball.com After being forced to find a resilient streak in the wake of several season-ending injuries, the Indiana Fever put their regular season lessons into postseason practice on Tuesday. Their 77-60 victory over Atlanta keeps…
